Job: Chief Product Officer (CPO) - Equity Share Position
Description: Join DEF - Learn English Live as our Chief Product Officer and become an integral part of a pioneering team committed to transforming the realm of language education. This is not your typical CPO role; we are offering a unique opportunity to join us as a stakeholder with an equity share compensation. With a team of five passionate professionals, you will navigate our product journey, anchoring our innovative live English teaching platform firmly in the market.Responsibilities:- Orchestrate the strategic product roadmap, aligning product development with the company's ambitious goals and our users' evolving needs.- Lead, inspire, and scale a dedicated product team, championing innovation, agile methodology, and user-centered design.- Conduct in-depth market and user research to identify and act upon growth opportunities, integrating insights into product enhancements.- Facilitate seamless collaboration between educational content creators, technology developers, and user experience designers to deliver an unmatched language learning platform.- Employ data-driven decision-making to track product performance, making adjustments to strategies in response to educational trends and user feedback.- Advance product innovation to boost user engagement and create transformative learning experiences.Requirements:- Proven leadership in product management, with a particular focus on EdTech or related fields.- Demonstrable experience in leading cross-functional teams and fostering a culture of collaboration and innovation.- Strong analytical skills, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable product strategies.- Deep understanding of product development cycles, UX/UI design principles, and agile frameworks.- Exceptional communication and stakeholder management skills, with a talent for building relationships and guiding teams to success.This is a chance to not just be an employee but a true partner in the company. As a CPO at DEF - Learn English Live, your compensation will be directly tied to an equity share, making you a vested partner in our success. If you're ready to take on a role where your contributions have a direct impact on the growth and direction of an innovative educational platform, we'd love to start a conversation with you.

We are looking for a Project Manager who is highly organized, detail-oriented, and results-driven, with a strong desire to achieve excellent results.ProjectWe invite a Project Manager to cooperate with the Enterprise and Game Solutions Unit. We are working with such domains as Gaming and Gambling, Automotive, Business Process Management Automation, Fintech, HealthCare, and others. We use Agile with technical excellence in place and Kanban approaches to do great work and make customers happy. We aim to offer our clients the best expertise in different domains to bring value to their business and become the best tech partner.Requirements- At least 3 years of practical experience as a Project Manager- Theoretical background in project management- Highly organized and detail-oriented- Strong time management skills- Excellent customer service skills and speaking/writing skills- Driven to deliver excellent results- Strong work ethic, reliable, trustworthy, and friendly- Upper-Intermediate level of English	Responsibilities- Project planning: estimate the efforts for project delivery, plan and schedule all required activities to meet the client‚Äôs business goal- Project control: monitor and report on project progress, make sure it is done within the defined timeline and budget- Stakeholders‚Äô management: manage communication and expectations of all project stakeholders- Team management: facilitate the whole development process, remove blockers, if any, motivate the team- People management: manage people, their personal development, and expectations- Risks management: indicate and track all project risks, work on their mitigation plan- Work with documentation: create all needed project documentation and keep it up-to-date

We are looking for a highly motivated and skilled Machine Learning Engineer to lead a Proof of Concept pilot project that aims to validate the potential of using ML-based methods to predict parcel delays during transit. This project aligns with our commitment to improving digital customer service and leveraging data-driven solutions to enhance our unique selling points.Key Objectives:- Establish a Machine Learning model that calculates the probability of parcel delays;- Determine the business value of the calculated probability;- Identify the most suitable Machine Learning model considering data limitations and time constraints.Scope:- Utilize raw data events related to parcel journeys from various integrators;- Enrich the dataset with additional variables such as actual departure, delivery and transit time, parcel delay status;- Incorporate secondary data, including service level, destination, customs value, and dimensions;- Work with a dataset containing at least one month's worth of data (80,000-100,000 parcels).Deliverables:- Develop a real-time Machine Learning model for estimating parcel delay probability;- Continuously update the probability from shipment to delivery, triggered by new events and at set intervals;- Present results in a confusion matrix to evaluate model accuracy comprehensively;- Provide a final presentation of the ML model, its accuracy, and critical findings;- Offer recommendations for further model refinement;- Facilitate model handover and documentation.Process Model:The Machine Learning Engineer will follow a structured process involving:- Exploratory Data Analysis: Gain a high-level understanding of the dataset through visualizations and domain expert feedback;- Selection of ML model: Choose the appropriate ML model;- Data Transformation: Prepare the data for ML model training;- ML Model Building: Train the ML model on the dataset;- ML Model Evaluation: Assess model accuracy using test data;Qualifications:- Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or related field;- Proven experience in Machine Learning model development and deployment (2-3 years);- Proficiency in programming languages such as Python or R;- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills;- Excellent communication and presentation abilities;- Experience with data analysis tools and libraries (e.g., Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-Learn);- Familiarity with data visualization tools (e.g., Matplotlib, Seaborn);- Knowledge of cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure) is a plus;- Spoken level of English (upper-intermediate).

Description: About CreatorHero:Join a revolution in the creator platform world! At CreatorHero, we empower OnlyFans agencies and creators globally by optimizing their operations and offering clarity on vital metrics. Launched in October 2022, we've seen rapid growth and have assisted over 500 agencies. Now, we're looking for talented individuals like you to be a part of our success story.Role Overview:As our Java Spring Boot Backend Developer, you will be instrumental in architecting, developing, and scaling the backend systems that power our dynamic dashboard. Your work will ensure stability, efficiency, and scalability of the infrastructure, as you collaborate with our product manager, Yad, and the broader team. You'll be at the heart of our system, managing data, integrating services, and optimizing for performance, while ensuring the entire backend infrastructure seamlessly supports the demands of our front-end application and business logic.Key Responsibilities:- Engineer and fine-tune the backend infrastructure using Java Spring Boot, Hibernate, JPQL, and other relevant technologies.- Ensure scalable, concurrent processing of data to deliver real-time insights to our users.- Engage in the design and implementation of database schemas, leveraging Redis for caching and fast data access.- Implement, maintain, and optimize our RESTful API, ensuring seamless integration with the front-end.What We Expect:- Proficiency in Java and Spring Boot, with hands-on experience in Hibernate, JPQL, Redis, and Docker.- A solid understanding of concurrent programming and multi-threaded applications.- A collaborative spirit and effective communication skills, especially when coordinating with front-end teams.- Strong accountability, dedication to quality, and the ability to meet tight deadlines.Why CreatorHero?- Personal Growth: Unlock your potential with consistent opportunities for development.- Innovative Culture: No rigid corporate structures here; we value open dialogue and collective decision-making.- Collaborative Planning: Your insights matter. Be a part of the planning and introduce cutting-edge technologies.- Instant Impact: Witness your projects go live swiftly, making a difference in the daily lives of creators and agencies.Join us and be a hero in the creator platform evolution!

Project Description:Founded in 1984, Our Client is the world's leading provider of lithography systems for the semiconductor industry, manufacturing complex machines that are critical to the production of integrated circuits or chips. Client has its R&D and manufacturing operations in Connecticut. Luxoft is currently searching to augment the Development & Engineering Department with talented software engineer to design and implement embedded software for systems among the highest precision ever produced in the world.The project seeking a new colleague is in charge with the software infrastructure and applications controlling the lithography process. Together with several other teams we create the software being used by all major players in the computer chips manufacturing industry. The scope of the project consists of development of Advanced Diagnostic Tools used in the lithography industry.The project consists of 8 scrum teams, some distributed and some co-located, owning software tools and applications in different technologies (Qt and C++, Python and bash, etc.)Responsibilities:As a software engineer in this project, you will be working on complex algorithms and application software.You will be working with electrical engineers, mechatronic engineers and system engineers to define the software requirements. After that you will be making a software design and document it using UML. All this is discussed and reviewed with your software team.A team of about 8 people consisting of a product owner, a scrum master, a technical lead, senior and junior developers. After your sw design is approved you are responsible for implementing the design in C for existing modules and C++ for new modules. A single module is roughly a 100.000 lines of code. Auto and unit testers are written in Python.After that is all reviewed you can go ahead and download the code to one of our lithography machines (which vary in price between 5 and 100 million dollar) and test the code. During the testing you will collect the necessary data so you can write a test report. This test report is then reviewed and when it is approved your software will be released. In a matter of days our customers will now be running with your software. The development environment is Red Hat Linux, execution environment is Wind River Linux. The software release driving a client machine is 40 million lines of code. Client sw teams work in various modes such as Agile and concurrent engineering.Mandatory Skills Description:‚Ä¢ Linux C/C++ applications programming experience‚Ä¢ experience with formal software quality through code review, static code analysis, unit testing, test automation‚Ä¢ Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills‚Ä¢ A passion for programming and software engineering‚Ä¢ Experience or proven ability in computational algorithms‚Ä¢ Experience or proven ability in technical specificationsNice-to-Have Skills:‚Ä¢ Agile Methodology‚Ä¢ Experience in Python, is a plus‚Ä¢ Experience with Qt GUI framework

Job: Senior QA Automation with Java OR Python  (Cloud and OOP mandatory)
Description: Project Description:You will be a QE counterpart of a highly collaborative GCP (Google Cloud Provider) Cloud Collector team thatis working on our newest cloud native product offering Cloud Native Application Observability (CNAO). Theteam builds microservices that collect observability data from Google Cloud and ingests it into Cisco Full StackObservability (FSO) platform for further processing, storage, cross domain correlation and visualization. Theproduct is based on a highly distributed microservice architecture.This role is technically demanding with a need for programming, understanding application architecture, anda dedication to understanding how customers use our products on SaaS (Software as a Service). Our top priorityas the Quality Engineering team is test automation and constantly adapting to maintain exceedingly highquality. Each member of the Quality Engineering team will develop tests and test applications, add to existingand build new framework/ tools, CI/CD processes, familiar with the latest DevOps processes and technologiesbeing used in the industry.Responsibilities:- building & improving automated testing frameworks, tools, automated test suites- writing test applications to closely resemble customer applications and use cases.- exploratory testing skills with a product and customer mindsetMandatory Skills Description:Java OR Python, TestNG, API test automation, exploratory testing, experience with GCP or any other Cloud Service Provider (Cloud experience mandatory)Nice-to-Have Skills:Debugging with Splunk, GrafanaExperience with DockerExperience with Component, Contract, and End to End testing frameworks using RESTful or similar APIs.Experience with infrastructure as code tools such as TerraformExperience with Web test automation tools such as Playwright

Starni Games is a Kyiv-based gamedev company, currently around 30 people. We develop and publish PC and Console premium (buy-to-play) games: TBS and RTS strategy games, text-based RPGs, etc.We are looking for a person to take charge of our internal marketing efforts, including company brand, self-publishing of some of our games, and cooperating with external publisher teams when we are working with a bigger publisher.This is full-time work in the office in Kyiv. What are we doing?Develux is an IT consulting and software development company with products for the US market and outsourcing services worldwide. The company has been on the market since 2014 and has achieved perfect results in our four business units. We have 300+ goal-oriented, passionate specialists who are open to new challenges.How old is the project? What stage is it at?We are in the ed-tech space helping hundreds of thousands of students deal with academic hurdles and questions. We have been around since 2014, overgrowing every year. Furthermore, we are currently working on expanding the functionality of our product, all while focusing on improving customer experience and increasing our financial metrics.Our company is a B2B2C educational platform that provides academic paper writing services. Our clients can choose the type of work, set requirements and deadlines, and choose the author. In addition, online chat allows customers and authors to communicate with each other to clarify.We also provide services for checking papers for plagiarism, editing and correcting text, and training and advice on improving research paper writing skills. Our team of writers consists of only the best experts, who are rigorously screened and constantly improve their skills.Our platform also provides the opportunity to receive feedback from authors and ask for technical support and help in choosing the best work.We constantly improve our platform and services to provide our customers with the highest convenience and quality.Our support team is always available to help customers with any questions regarding our platform. We strive to ensure that our clients have only a positive experience with us and recommend us to their friends and colleagues.What do you need to do?Writing tests and increasing the coverage of performance tests;Defining and validating workload and resource demands;Mentoring and sharing knowledges with team members;Collaborate with developers to pinpoint performance bottlenecks and recommend optimization strategies.Produce comprehensive performance reports, graphs, and metrics for stakeholders.Setting and tracking delivery objectives and tasks with management;Execute testing and provide detailed test results and metrics;Improving performance approach;Collaborate and coordinate performance test planning with the development, leadership teams, and stakeholders to ensure consistent project execution;Gather and maintain test data for testing activities.Technologies:Python/DjangoReact/AngularJMeterJenkins, GitHubRequired hard skills:Proven expertise with performance testing tools like JMeter, LoadRunner;Hands-on experience in Load/Performance/Stress/Volume testing;Performance testing experience with JMeter (required), LoadRunner or Locust (optional);Experience with programming languages(capability to read and write code): Python;Experience with API (REST) testing, testing microservices;Experience in technical testing (e.g. reading logs, SQL, XML, MongoDB, etc.);Understanding of Agile/Scrum methodologies;Experience with Continuous Integration tools (CI/CD), Jenkins, GitHub Actions.Additional hard skills:QA certification, such as ISTQB or CSTE;Experience with automation testing tools, e.g., Selenium, and Appium;Experience in building performance frameworks from scratch;Understanding or experience with Kubernetes.Questions and Answers:- Does the job come with a probation period, and if so, how long does it last?Yes, there is a three-month probation period.- What is the expected work schedule?Full-time, flexible, please start no later than 11:00 (on average 8 hours per day). The office in Kyiv is open from 9:00 to 20:00. You can work remotely and also you can choose hybrid mode where you can combine working on-site and remotely.- How many vacation and sick days are provided?Annual paid vacation ‚Äì 21 working days; Paid confirmed sick leave; 6 unconfirmed sick days/days off a year.What social package and benefits are offered?- English courses (up to 80 USD/month after successful completion of the probation period)- Compensation for the cost of a subscription sports center (up to 80 USD/month after successful completion of the probation period)- Medical insurance (50% after successful completion of the probation period) or $200 a year for health care- Corporate events.Hiring process:HR-call with RecruiterTest taskInterview with the Hiring manager (1 hour)Proposal for cooperation with Develux.We believe that people with different perspectives and lived experiences drive the company to create unique solutions.For the interview, we require the file with tests that you have performed without sensitive data in JMeter (.jmx) or in another tool that you used.

The Technical Support Engineer is primarily responsible for delivering exceptional customer service and providing technical guidance to operators and aggregators. They specialize in diagnosing and resolving various technical challenges related to product issues, including errors, reporting discrepancies, and gaming problems. The core objective of the technical support engineer is to maintain customer satisfaction and minimize operational disruptions through efficient and effective problem-solving. The Technical Support Engineer reports directly to the Support Team Leader.The schedule consists of two-day shifts, followed by two days off, and then two-night shifts, with an additional two days off.Responsibilities:- Offer timely and professional responses to customer inquiries and support requests via chats and emails;- Detect, troubleshoot, and effectively resolve technical problems encountered by operators and their clients;- Provide customers with detailed, step-by-step instructions to help resolve technical issues.- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers and account managers, to address complex technical issues;- Contribute to product testing, monitor and document bugs, and report results to the development or quality assurance teams;- Maintain records of customer interactions, including issues, solutions, and follow-up actions using a ticketing system;- Perform configuration settings and changes in the CRM system to onboard new clients and support existing ones.Requirements:- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent work experience);- Strong background in technical support, customer service, or a related role;- Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills to identify and resolve technical challenges.- Exceptional communication abilities, both verbal and written, with the capability to explain technical concepts to non-technical individuals;- Proficiency in using ticketing systems, CRM software, and various support tools;- Knowledge of hardware, software, operating systems, and networking principles;- English proficiency at an Upper-Intermediate level or higher;- Preferred: 1+ year of experience in the gambling industry.Hard Skills:- Proficiency in log analysis using tools like ELK (Elasticsearch, Kibana), with the ability to search, filter, and analyze log data to identify issues and trends effectively;- Understanding the principles of API design, including skills in designing RESTful APIs, defining resource endpoints, HTTP methods, and request/response formats (e.g., JSON, XML);- Proficiency in testing APIs to ensure functionality, reliability, and performance, utilizing tools like Postman for response validation and handling edge cases;- Basic knowledge of database security principles and best practices, including securing database access, encrypting sensitive data, implementing user roles and permissions, and auditing database activity.Company offers:- Option to work fully remotely or in a modern office;- Health insurance coverage;- Partial coverage for English language training;- Competitive salary package;Paid vacation and sick leaves;- Cover taxes;- Friendly and supportive atmosphere.

Cloudwatch, Lambda, Dynamo, API Gateway, S3, SQS, RDS- Strong experience creating APIs from scratch and integrating with 3rd party APIs- Solid knowledge of Database technologies (Dynamo, PostgreSQL, SQL) and database schema design and development- Strong experience with logs and ability to troubleshoot efficiently- Strong experience with version source control (Git)- Experience with documenting code- Team orientedBonus:- Financial services, FinTech, payments, accounting- Understanding of NLP, Data Science, FMs

Join Our Rapidly Expanding Window Repair Company as a Remote Sales Representative!Are you a highly motivated sales professional with a proven track record of success? Do you possess excellent English-speaking skills and a keen understanding of the US market?
